docs.snippet: Bryn Forbes scored a career-high 33 points, hitting a conference record 11 3-pointers, and No. 2 Michigan State woke up in the second half to rout Rutgers 97-66 on Wednesday night, handing the Scarlet Knights their 17th straight loss....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bryn Forbes scored a career-high 33 points, hitting a conference record 11 3-pointers, and No. 2 Michigan State woke up in the second half to rout Rutgers 97-66 on Wednesday night, handing the Scarlet Knights their 17th straight loss.

headline.main: Raptors Beat Jazz 104-94 for 11th Straight Home Win
headline.print_headline: Raptors Beat Jazz 104-94 for 11th Straight Home Win

docs.snippet: Kyle Lowry scored 32 points, DeMar DeRozan added 31 and the Toronto Raptors beat the Utah Jazz 104-94 on Wednesday night for their club-record 11th straight home win....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kyle Lowry scored 32 points, DeMar DeRozan added 31 and the Toronto Raptors beat the Utah Jazz 104-94 on Wednesday night for their club-record 11th straight home win.

headline.main: McClendon Remembered as Energy 'Visionary' Despite Controversy
headline.print_headline: McClendon Remembered as Energy 'Visionary' Despite Controversy

docs.snippet: Aubrey McClendon, an oil and gas entrepreneur whose outsized ambition and high tolerance for risk propelled him to become a leading figure in the American energy revolution, died in a single-car crash on Wednesday in Oklahoma City. He was 56....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aubrey McClendon, an oil and gas entrepreneur whose outsized ambition and high tolerance for risk propelled him to become a leading figure in the American energy revolution, died in a single-car crash on Wednesday in Oklahoma City. He was 56.

headline.main: Thomas Helps Celtics Beat Blazers for 12th Straight Home Win

headline.main: No. 10 West Virginia Routs Texas Tech on Senior Night
headline.print_headline: No. 10 West Virginia Routs Texas Tech on Senior Night

docs.snippet: Senior Jaysean Paige and Daxter Miles Jr. each scored 15 points and No. 10 West Virginia closed out its home regular season on senior night Wednesday by trouncing Texas Tech 90-68....

headline.main: Capitals Beat Maple Leafs 3-2 Despite Being Outplayed
headline.print_headline: Capitals Beat Maple Leafs 3-2 Despite Being Outplayed

docs.snippet: Matt Niskanen and the NHL's top power play unit cashed in yet again as the Washington Capitals outlasted the youthful and overmatched Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 on Wednesday night....
